knimeNode.name: Extract FORMAT
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts a value from the FORMAT/CALL columns in a VCF file

fullDescription.intro:
Extracts a key/value from a FORMAT and a Call column in a VCF file. Example: GT:PL:GQ 1/1:37,3,0:4
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: the FORMAT column in the VCF
the CALL column in the VCF
The type of data to be extracted (int, double, boolean, etc... )
the name of the flag to be extracted
